Comments_List: I learned more tenses, more vocabulary and had more experience in writing.
I think the strengths were in covering some important tenses, and there were interesting readings and good class discussions.

I would recommend it to another student, but I would tell them it's likely a very relaxed course. It was a nice atmosphere and was a comfortable way to learn Swahili. It's also great that the class is small.
